i have no idea how to reinstall my grub boot loader for dual booting ubuntu and window 7
have you updated your grub config since you've installed ?
sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg
sri was in another room, you need to mount the partition wehre grub is installed first. see the link above for directions on how best to do that.
yes, the link you posted, in your case, it looks to be /sda5 is what you need to mount
sudo /mount /dev/sda5 /mnt/sda5
not according to this: http://pastebin.com/Ym8HEuDm  /sda6 is the swap
sudo mkdir /mnt/sda5 && sudo mount /dev/sda5 /mnt/sda5
now: sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg
Ok, how did you install grub2 ?
ok: sudo apt-get install grub-pc /dev/sda
then update again.
